SPAIN HOLIDAYS

Home > Holidays > Spain

Spain is a European nation which can be found situated between France, to the northeast, and Portugal, to the west. One of the most singular destinations on the globe, Spain boasts a unique culture which is unlike anywhere else in the world. Just thinking the word 'Spain' immediately calls certain images to mind, whether that be the sea-shell-inspired buildings of famed Catalonian architect Antoni Gaudi, the Dadaist masterpieces of legendary surrealist artist Salvador Dali, or the piquant scents and flavours of the signature cuisine of Spain - ranging from gazpacho, a raw vegetable soup served ice cold, to paella, a delectable wet rice dish traditionally infused with seafood or rabbit!

The third most-visited country in the world, Spain is surpassed by only America and France when it comes to international tourist arrivals. A grand total of 75 million visitors flock to the country annually in order to experience its culture, its history, its beaches and its cuisine. If you'd like to join them, there's never been a finer time to book a cheap holiday to Spain.
